about.chat_with_me: I would love to chat about job opportunities, my projects, diversity in tech, or whatever is on your mind. So do not hesiate to contact me.
about.title: About me
about.who: I am Kim-Anh. I am { my_age } years old. I am a Software Engineer from INSA de Toulouse, France. I am interested in software development, web development and video games. You could see some of my projects below.
